sources.title: The Secret of Dr. Kildare (1939) LIONEL BARRYMORE
sources.description:
Stars: Lew Ayres, Lionel Barrymore, Lionel Atwill 
Director: Harold S. Bucquet

Young Dr. Kildare takes a case caring for the daughter of a Wall Street tycoon, who suffers from severe headaches and occasional hysterical blindness.

metadata.Plot: Dr. Gillespie's cancer has gotten worse, and to force him to take a rest instead of pursuing a sulfa-drug/pneumonia study, Kildare refuses to assist Gillespie, and instead accepts a case of hysterical blindness. She's also the daughter of a millionaire who could help the hospital.
metadata.Writer: Max Brand, Willis Goldbeck, Harry Ruskin
metadata.Actors: Lew Ayres, Lionel Barrymore, Lionel Atwill
